name: Tier 4 Spell Fumbles (Levels 13-20)
description: Fumble effects for spell attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Even archmages can fail catastrophically.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your spell fizzles harmlessly with no additional penalty.
Catastrophic Backlash - The spell's energy rebounds devastatingly. Take 3d8 force damage.
Magic Burnout - Your magic fails completely. You cannot cast spells until you complete a short rest.
Complete Sensory Overload - You are blinded, deafened, stunned, and prone until the end of your next turn.
Massive Slot Burn - The failed casting burns out many spell slots. Lose 2d4 spell slots.
Spell Devastates You - Your spell affects you at critical power. Take the spell's full critical damage and effects on yourself.
Fatigued - The failed spell utterly drains you. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute.
Catastrophic Wild Magic - A devastating wild magic explosion occurs. All creatures within 30 feet must make DC 17 Dex save or take 4d6 force damage.
